div.p: The Indians that hunts about this Great Lake is Red Knives Slaves (or dog Rib) and Hair Indians[.] The Red Knives that Resorts here is twenty five men with their familys[.] Their Lands is on the E. side of the Lake[.] [T]he remainder of them which is about one hundred men) or hunters trades at Slave Lake[.] [T]hey are the best Hunters of Beaver on this side of Pease River[.] [T]heir general Hunting dress is the Cariboux skin drest with the Hair on for the winter & the moose deerskin without the Hair for the Summer[.] [E]very band has their Chief (or Becondere)[.] [E]ach Chief has from ten to 30 men according to their Esteem or fear of him, as they most generaley are stronger than any of their Band[.] [T]hey often fight for their woman[.] [T]he strongest carrys off the woman by the Hair of the Head[.] [T]heir way of fighting is by pulling by the hair to bring their oponents to the ground and there they hold him until he gives up all Claim to the woman[.] [T]his gives great amusement to the lookers on although they never interfere[.] [T]hey have Likewise a Custom of taking a woman in the woods and four of them holds his, one to each Leg & arm, while the whole Camp of men except her relations, has Carnal Connection with her[.] [S]uch poor woman as this happens to is always despised afterwards[.]

The Slaves (say) Dog Rib Indians is about 250 men & Boy[.] [T]hey was formerly on the Borders of Slave Lake but was drove here by the Crees[.] [T]hey are very poor hunters[.] [T]hey only hunt the Beaver[.] [S]pring and fall their prinsipal diet is fish[.] [T]hey make nets of the green whillow which is superior to ours of thread and as fine[.] [T]hey Likewise spur fish with a spur made of the Carriboux Horn and take Trout with the Line set under the Ice[.] [T]he Hooks is generally made with a Rib Bone of the Beaver fastened to a small piece of wood (thus [simple diagram][).] [T]he men does all the works even makes his own shoes[.] [T]he woman dress skins and works belts &ca with porqupine quils[.] [I]n the winter they eat their fish Raw or very little rosted only on the out side while the
